items.description: A list of the items that make up the overall transaction. The items may include subitems.

taxYear.description: The tax year to which the item relates, in the format YYYY-YY

documentId.description:
A unique ID is used to reference the document of which this is a subitem.
Must conform to the regular expression: ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,30}$

documentType.description: A unique ID is used to reference the document type of which this is a subitem.

documentTypeDescription.description: The Description of the main charge type

chargeType.description: A unique ID is used to identify the type of sub-item.

chargeTypeDescription.description:
Name of charge type.
Must conform to the regular expression:
^[0-9A-Za-z]{1,30}$

taxPeriodFrom.description:
The 'from' date of this tax period.
Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

taxPeriodTo.description:
The 'to' date of this tax period.
Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

contractAccount.description: A contract account is the accounting record for a particular charge type.

documentNumber.description:
Same as Document Number/ID unless on output there is no postings (zero amounts) then the Form Bundle is returned 

Must conform to the regular expression: ^[0-9A-Za-z]{1,12}$

documentNumberItem.description: An identifier for this part of the overall transaction is used to link an allocation and charge.

chargeReference.description: A unique reference number is associated with the charge.

originalAmount.description:
The original amount of this transaction.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

outstandingAmount.description:
The remaining amount is due on this transaction.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

clearedAmount.description:
The cleared value of this transaction. For example, the paid amount of a charge. 
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

accruedInterest.description:
The accrued interest of this transaction.
Accrued interest is interest calculated and charged.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places
